text: Dietfurt, now part of the town of Treuchtlingen, is a German village in Middle Franconia, Bavaria. Earlier to 1853 it was for centuries the place of an important post station on the road between Augsburg and Nuremberg.Frank Wagner, Kirchenführer Johanneskirche Dietfurt, Dietfurt 2004. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Villages in Bavaria Category:Weißenburg- Gunzenhausen
title: Dietfurt in Mittelfranken
